comment._content: I think this is the same ship. www.history.navy.mil/photos/sh-usn/usnsh-i/id4080.htm U.S.S. Imperator was built in 1913, so the dates match.

comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: there is also a photo on this site of a German ship named the Imperator and the Kaiser at her launch. Try Imperator tag to see it.
